summary: AN ORDINANCE amending Seattle's Voluntary Deferred Compensation Plan to allow lump-sum cash outs of small accounts, to expand transferability to other eligible plans, to accelerate the deadline for commencing benefits and to add criteria for scheduling payment of benefits; and amending Seattle Municipal code Sections 4.38.401, 4.38.504, 4.38.402 and 4.38.404, respectively, and Ordinance 112516 therefor.
